name: ooni
description: ooni is a community-driven meme token launched on the Solana blockchain, aimed at capturing and sharing internet culture through creative, humor-driven content. The project centers around creating and curating memes related to real-life events and crypto culture, blending storytelling and satire to engage users. Future plans include community participation through NFTs and digital collectibles, rewarding early supporters and fostering deeper interaction within the OONI ecosystem.
